channel.title: High-Temperature Tolerance on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in High-Temperature Tolerance on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: HTH5
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g05740 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0150000 Gene Symbol: HTH5 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 ,Â IRGSP-1.

item.title: PlTOE3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PlTOE3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Paeonia lactiflora Functional Description: These results illustrated that PlTOE3 bound the PlTDC promoter to enhance high-temperature stress tolerance by increasing phytomelatonin production in P.

item.title: SlMPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc12g019460 Gene Symbol: SlMPK1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.
